infos.value: An important task when leading units in battle is understanding the relationships they share between each other.
Comrades who get along well can be beneficial to battle in surprising ways. It is best to keep this in mind when forming parties or engaging with the enemy.
Units who <color=#00ffff>battle together</color> will gradually gain <color=#00ffff>Affinity</color>.
Units' Affinity will <color=#00ffff>increase further still</color> when they <color=#00ffff>perform actions near each other</color> on the battlefield.
When a unit <color=#00ffff>performs an action near another unit</color> with whom they share a high <color=#00ffff>level</color> of <color=#00ffff>Affinity</color>...
...their <color=#00ffff>DEX</color>, <color=#00ffff>AGI</color>, and <color=#00ffff>Luck</color> stats <color=#00ffff>rise</color>. This is highly advantageous for keeping the battle in one's favor.
